id.description: A unique integer value identifying this risk_ acceptance.

name.description: Descriptive name which in the future may also be used to group risk acceptances together across engagements and products

recommendation.title: Security Recommendation
recommendation.description:
Recommendation from the security team.

* `A` - Accept (The risk is acknowledged, yet remains)
* `V` - Avoid (Do not engage with whatever creates the risk)
* `M` - Mitigate (The risk still exists, yet compensating controls make it less of a threat)
* `F` - Fix (The risk is eradicated)
* `T` - Transfer (The risk is transferred to a 3rd party)

decision.description:
Risk treatment decision by risk owner

* `A` - Accept (The risk is acknowledged, yet remains)
* `V` - Avoid (Do not engage with whatever creates the risk)
* `M` - Mitigate (The risk still exists, yet compensating controls make it less of a threat)
* `F` - Fix (The risk is eradicated)
* `T` - Transfer (The risk is transferred to a 3rd party)

decision_details.description: If a compensating control exists to mitigate the finding or reduce risk, then list the compensating control(s).

accepted_by.description: The person that accepts the risk, can be outside of DefectDojo.

expiration_date.description: When the risk acceptance expires, the findings will be reactivated (unless disabled below).

expiration_date_warned.description: (readonly) Date at which notice about the risk acceptance expiration was sent.

expiration_date_handled.description: (readonly) When the risk acceptance expiration was handled (manually or by the daily job).

reactivate_expired.title: Reactivate findings on expiration
reactivate_expired.description: Reactivate findings when risk acceptance expires?

restart_sla_expired.title: Restart SLA on expiration
restart_sla_expired.description: When enabled, the SLA for findings is restarted when the risk acceptance expires.

owner.description: User in DefectDojo owning this acceptance. Only the owner and staff users can edit the risk acceptance.
